name: Abhishek Kotte
reviewTxt: The driving experience is superb and amazing and enjoyed a lot.According to comfortable level is awesome and coming to seating matter it's comfort for single person and for dual person little much uncomfortable that's it and over all around the bike is simply superb and awesome.

name: RAJ NARE
reviewTxt: This bike is like prototype i love drive with this naked yamaha mt15. for dual person little much uncomfortable that's it and over all around the bike is simply superb and awesome.

name: Subin Anand
reviewTxt: The vehicle was good.Service was not proper.Engine oil was not changed.That led to engine seizing.Warrenty was claimed and i received bike after 1 month in service centre.

name: Krishna Kanth
reviewTxt: I am driving smoothness and comfort best things of bike colours and bike attractive look overall bike is good mileage and build qualitypickup is super top notchbest one thing no vibrations in this bikeyamaha is only good for service better then othersi love mt 15
